newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Budapest trading halted due to technical problems.
newsitem.headline: Budapest trading halted due to technical problems.

text.p: Trading on the Budapest Stock Exchange (BSE) has been halted due to technical problems but trading will resume soon, a BSE official said by telephone.
"We are holding a 20-minute break due to communications problems," she said.
"Communications links were cut with three of the remote trading stations because the downtown telephone center has problems."
The bourse official said the break will last until traders of the three bourse member securities houses using remote trading stations appear on the trading floor to continue trading there.
The BSE earlier this year introduced remote trading which allows subscribers to the system to trade from their own offices instead of going onto the floor.
The official said the BSE would publish a statement on the suspension of trade later today.
